House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07822
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO AMEND REPUBLIC ACT 9994 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE EXPANDED SENIOR CITIZENS ACT OF 2010 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Grants twenty percent (20%) discount for those who are 60 years old but not more than 70 years old; thirty percent (30%) discount for those who are 70 years old but not more than 80 years old; forty percent (40 %) discount for those who are 80 years old but not more than 90 years old; and fifty percent (50%) discount for those who are 90 years old and over.
